Durham County Band League Group Contest 0 Test Piece Contest

Horden Workmen's Club, County Durham Waltz contest - 1st Horden, 2nd Hartlepool, 3rd Easington Colliery, 4th Easington N.F.S. March contest - 1st Horden, 2nd Hartlepool. 6 bands competed
Nov. 2, 2013, 5:12 p.m. Feb. 2, 2019, 11:19 a.m.
1 BHK (UK) Horden Band John Dennis Scoins
2 West Hartlepool Mission Silver Cliff Midgley
3 Easington Public Band Cecil Peacock
4 Easington Colliery Band W. H. Gelson
5 Wingate Colliery Alfred Cartwright
6 Shotton Colliery Band Edward Kitto
